review:
I highly recommend Dr. Swapnil Sinha for her exceptional care during our pregnancy journey. From the very beginning, she was attentive, compassionate, *** ********** ************** She always took the time to answer all our queries, no matter how small, and her reassuring demeanor eased our anxieties throughout the pregnancy.

Her expertise was evident at every stage, and her proactive approach ensured that any potential issues were addressed promptly. She made us feel comfortable and confident, providing thorough explanations and support. On the day of delivery, her calm and professional presence was invaluable, resulting in a smooth and successful birth.

We are profoundly grateful for her dedication and care. She truly made our pregnancy experience positive and memorable. We cannot thank her enough for her unwavering support and highly recommend her to anyone in need of outstanding obstetric care.
Absolutely delightful experience,  very detail oriented,  humble,  very good in her specialization.  Absolutely recommendable for most of the gyne issues.

I visited Dr. Swapnil Sinha for menstruation related issues. I was having this problem for past 5 years and had shown to couple of gynaecs but none could suggest a satisfactory solution. Dr. Sinha, however, could not only diagnose the problem accurately but also put me on the best treatment course. The best part about her is that she patiently listens to the patient and then explains every detail in the best possible way. I have rarely come across specialists who devote so much time to one single patient. Highly recommend Dr. Sinha for her ******* ********** patience, dedication to her job and focus on creating happy patients!

review: Hi Dr. swapnil sinha,Thanks for your guidance regarding pregnancy. I understood that it was too early for my consultation since it has been just 4 months of my marriage life. But still, I would like to put up my point stating that you patiently answered all my doubts clearly. And i would be happy to share that I am conceived the next month I consulted you and now I am 11 weeks pregnant. Thank you so much ma'am.
